name: 2.2 "Li'l Sister Don't Cha" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who stopped Diane and Sam from kissing?
questions.explanation:
Coach.

	As Sam and Diane were about to kiss Coach stuck a piece of paper between them thus stopping the kiss. When Sam said, "Coach we were about to kiss," Coach responded, "We were?"

questions.text: What did it say in Carla's yearbook?
questions.correct: She'd be pregnant the rest of her life.
options: She's never find a man who loved her.
questions.explanation:
She'd be pregnant the rest of her life.

	Carla was frustrated that she hadn't gone into labor yet and said, "My high school yearbook was right, I'm gonna be pregnant forever." She tried everything to go into labor including jumping up and down to get that baby to come out.

questions.text: Who helped Carla go into labor with her last baby?
questions.explanation:
Benny Hill.

	She said she laughed so hard she went into labor. Diane then offered to make a funny face and she made several, to which Carla replied, "I don't think it'll help, but go ahead."

questions.text: What was one of Carla's sister's nickname?
questions.explanation:
No neck.

	Carla didn't say what this sister's real name was. She did say they all (except the good one) had nicknames.

Muffin.

	Diane said that muffin was her nickname as well because she was "so sweet and toasty." Carla said her nickname was muffin because "Once my brothers stuffed my ears with yeast and tried to bake my face."

questions.text: Was Carla close with her sister that came to help at the bar while she was having the baby?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Carla described her sister as being the good one. She said she had always been shy and a wallflower.

Rhea Perlman.

	Rhea Perlman who played Carla also played her sister in this episode. Rhea Perlman was born March 31, 1948 in Brooklyn, NY. She married actor Danny DeVito.

Cliff.

	According to Carla, Annette was shy and didn't have many boyfriends. However, in the short time she was at Cheers she had already gotten two phone numbers: Cliff's and another man's.

questions.text: Cliff said, "If I weren't wearing this uniform I'd ask you to step outside." What did Norm reply?
questions.correct: "If you weren't wearing that uniform, we'd all step outside."
options: "Cliff, calm down it was just a joke."
questions.explanation:
"If you weren't wearing that uniform, we'd all step outside."

	Paul had been picking on Cliff about his profession. He made a comment that if he "addressed it to anyone it would probably get lost in the mail." Cliff, fed up with the insults, made the comment about stepping outside.

questions.text: Who kissed Sam in his office?
questions.explanation:
Annette.

	Sam was trying to explain to Annette that men in bars can be womanizers and she should be careful. He thought she was as innocent as Carla said, but instead she came on to him.
